title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check
documentation for more info. If you get any problems
when using Hexo, you can find the answer in
troubleshooting or you can ask me
on GitHub.
Quick Start
Create a new post
1$ hexo new "My New Post"
More info: Writing
Run server
1$ hexo server
More info: Server
Generate static files
1$ hexo generate
More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites
1$ hexo deploy
More info: Deployment
